oai_dc:dc.dc:title: U.S. Army Recruiting Station
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thompson Brothers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: U.S. Army Recruiting Station sign on truck, also Uncle Sam "I Want You for U.S. Army" sign. Men in military uniforms lined up beside cars and trucks on Main Street, Knoxville, TN. J.Y. Johnston house at right.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Houses; Military personnel; Military uniforms; Trucks; Automobiles;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
